entry.title: BitMail.sf.net - encrypted p2p email
entry.summary: In a brief message, someone named Wendell pleads with Jesus to stop something. The message is posted on grabhive.com and linked to a Twitter account and a GPG key. In an email sent on August 9th, 2013 at 9:01 PM, Randolph D. asks if anyone has tested a secure encrypted peer-to-peer email service, providing links to the service's source code repository and commit browser.
